description: This notification is generated when a
hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus object for one of the configured
cross-connect entries is about to leave the down
state and transition into some other state (but not
into the notPresent state). This other state is
indicated by the included value of
hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus.

event.Summary: Operational status of MPLS xc is up

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCUp HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCIndex i 9999 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentIfIndex i 9999 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentLabel u 0 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsOutSegmentIndex i 9999 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCAdminStatus i 1 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus i 1

description: Primary index for the conceptual row identifying
a group of cross-connect segments.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCIndex

description: This is a unique index for an entry in the
hpnicfmplsInSegmentTable. This value represents the
interface index for the incoming MPLS interface. A
value of zero represents an incoming label from the
per-platform label space. In this case, the
hpnicfmplsInSegmentLabel is interpreted to be an MPLS-type
label.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentIfIndex

description: The incoming label for this segment.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentLabel

description: This value contains a unique index for this row.
While a value of 0 is not valid as an index for this
row it can be supplied as a valid value to index
hpnicfmplsXCTable to access entries for which no out-
segment has been configured.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsOutSegmentIndex

description: The desired operational status of this segment.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCAdminStatus

description: The actual operational status of this cross-
connect.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus

description: This notification is generated when a
hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus object for one of the configured
cross-connect entries is about to enter the down
state from some other state (but not from the
notPresent state). This other state is indicated by
the included value of hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus.

event.Summary: Operational status of MPLS xc is down

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCDown HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCIndex i 9999 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentIfIndex i 9999 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentLabel u 0 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsOutSegmentIndex i 9999 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCAdminStatus i 1 HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus i 1

description: Primary index for the conceptual row identifying
a group of cross-connect segments.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCIndex

description: This is a unique index for an entry in the
hpnicfmplsInSegmentTable. This value represents the
interface index for the incoming MPLS interface. A
value of zero represents an incoming label from the
per-platform label space. In this case, the
hpnicfmplsInSegmentLabel is interpreted to be an MPLS-type
label.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentIfIndex

description: The incoming label for this segment.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsInSegmentLabel

description: This value contains a unique index for this row.
While a value of 0 is not valid as an index for this
row it can be supplied as a valid value to index
hpnicfmplsXCTable to access entries for which no out-
segment has been configured.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsOutSegmentIndex

description: The desired operational status of this segment.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCAdminStatus

description: The actual operational status of this cross-
connect.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-MPLS-LSR-MIB::hpnicfmplsXCOperStatus
